profile.rationale: The job title "Junior Java Engineer" indicates a role focused on software development (Macro-Category A). The advertisement provides no information about AI/ML tasks or technologies, suggesting it does not involve AI/ML integration. Therefore, it aligns with the Software Engineer profile, which is characterized by tasks exclusively from Macro-Category A and no AI/ML integration.
